article.title: Unisys Selected by Commonwealth of Pennsylvania to Modernize Law Enforcement Network
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Unisys has received a contract from the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania to modernize the Commonwealth Law Enforcement Assistance Network (CLEAN), the state's mission-critical law enforcement communications system. Under the 18-month contract, Unisys will upgrade the CLEAN system to allow state troopers to communicate directly with other state, local and federal law enforcement officials.
